attributes.action: Abandon plans to make it a criminal offence to possess "violent pornography"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposed law would create a Thought Crime making it illegal to possess "sexual  images" that, in the subjective opinion of members of the Home Office, show activities "liable to cause serious injury or death" even if the participants were consenting adult actors.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abandon plans to make it a criminal offence to possess "violent pornography"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11535.asp

Prime Minister's Office
